com.kakao.auth.authorization.authcode

Interface AuthCodeManager

  • package com.kakao.auth.authorization.authcode
public interface AuthCodeManager
    Interface responsible for getting authorization code from Kakao OAuth server.

    • Method Detail

      • void createAccountAndRequestAuthCode(com.kakao.auth.helper.StartActivityWrapper wrapper,
                                   AuthCodeCallback callback)
        통합 계정 회원 가입 후 authorization code 를 요청. Request for an authorization code after creating a Kakao account.
        Parameters:
        wrapper - wrapper StartActivityWrapper for activity or fragment
        callback - Success/Failure callback for getting authorization code
      • boolean handleActivityResult(int requestCode,
                           int resultCode,
                           Intent data)
        Parameters:
        requestCode - RequestCode of Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)
        resultCode - ResultCode of Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)
        data - Intent delievered from Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)
        Returns:
        true if this intent is requested by Kakao SDK, false otherwise.
      • boolean isStoryLoginAvailable()
        Check if KakaoStory installed supports Kakao login.
        Returns:
        true if KakaoTalk installed on the
      • boolean isTalkLoginAvailable()
        Check if KakaoTalk installed supports Kakao login.
        Returns:
        true if KakaoTalk installed on the device supports login, false if not or not installed at all
      • void requestAuthCode(AuthType authType,
                   Activity activity,
                   AuthCodeCallback authCodeCallback)
        Request authorization code with the given AuthType.
        Parameters:
        authType - AuthType enum specifying authentication method
        activity - Activity to show login activity upon
        authCodeCallback - Success/Failure callback for getting authorization code
